name: export

schema.title: Expo Export
schema.description: Export the JavaScript and assets for your app using Metro/webpack bundler.

platform.description: Choose the platform to compile for

dev.description: Bundle for development environments without minifying code or stripping the __DEV__ boolean. Configure static files for developing locally using a non-https server.

clear.description: Clear the bundler cache before exporting

outputDir.description: The directory to export the static files to. Default: dist

maxWorkers.description: Maximum number of tasks to allow Metro to spawn

dumpAssetmap.description: Dump the asset map for further processing

dumpSourcemap.description: Dump the source map for debugging the JS bundle

bundler.description: Choose the bundler to compile for

description: Export the JavaScript and assets for your app using Metro/webpack bundler
